dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.4b6jkg
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Pica pica (Linnaeus, 1758)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 29 records from Birds of Northern Eurasia 42 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 1 records from RBINS Bird collection 1 records from LSUMZ Birds Collection 3861 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 5 records from NABU|naturgucker 1 records from RBINS DaRWIN 7 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 1 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Aves 1 records from UWBM Ornithology Collection 6 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 195 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 1 records from Vertebrates Collection of the Karaganda Buketov University Museum of Nature 1 records from Vertebrates of the Gothenburg Natural History Museum (GNM) 56 records from Hatikka.fi observations 1 records from Collection Aves (bird skeletons) SMF 367 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
